label: 差出
説明文: Sashidashi, in the parlance of late medieval and early modern times, referred to documentation of arable land submitted in response to the demands of higher authority.#[article]Ogura Hideki. The 'Great Land Survey' of the Chōkyō Era' Submitted by the Peasants of Shibuta Estate in the Demesne of Kōyasan.
